subject.value: reforma de la tenencia de la tierra

journal.title: Problems of Economics : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Gridyushko, A.N., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: In course of the research there was studied the problems of reformation of the land relationships. In the research there were used the study records of leading scientist of the Republic of Belarus and foreign countries. As a result of research it was revealed that the essence of land transformations in the context of the agrarian reform. The estimate of the organization of reformation in the different countries was given. The results of the past stage of reform in the Republic of Belarus were determined. The directions of the development of land relationships with account of the development of their receptions and methods of the market and state regulations were offered. In terms of economic conceptual approach the whole system of land relations should be aimed at ensuring the rational land use to meet current and future challenges of social development based on an assessment of the resource potential of land, development of methods and tools to support the most effective and economical for owners and resource users.
